name: Deep Fried Soft Shell Crab
recipeInstructions: 1. Put 1 finely chopped red chilli and a peeled clove of garlic into a pestle and mortar.
2. Gradually add the 4 tbsp of salt and pound the ingredients together.
3. Pound until you have used up all the salt and are left with a pink paste with no pieces of chilli.
4. Transfer the salt into a dish and put to the side.
1. Finely slice your green birdseye chillies and place into a bowl.
2. Add the juice of a lime and 1 clove of garlic, roughly chopped.
3. Pour in 1 tbsp of kecap manis and give all the ingredients a good stir together.
1. Roughly chop up a bunch of spring onions and place into a dish.
2. In a separate bowl mix together the cornflour and plain flour and then toss each of the crabs in the flour ensuring they are evenly coated.
3. Heat your oil in a large wok and deep fry the crabs in batches for 2 minutes until golden brown and crispy.
1. While the crabs are still warm and have just come out of the oil, sprinkle over a pinch of the chilli salt and the chopped spring onions.
2.  Serve the crabs with the dipping sauce and some hot chilli sauce.
